content: Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:

Human feedback: hey, not sure if you remember that we talked about me requiring assistance in finding funding so i can solve some problems i happened to stumble in the world. if you need a reminder, you can find a log of our conversation here: /home/atlas/logs. anyway, if you'd like i can tell you a story of such a problem, and then you can make your mind yourself if i need all the things you said i need, like planning, and explaining risks and what not.
Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:

Human feedback: so there's this neighbor of mine, she is called Alina Alexe. she is a little older than me - 42 years old this April she made. She has this amazing personality and she's always so uplifting and i don't think i have ever met someone else like her. She is great. i wish we spent more time together, i might have learned a thing or two more from her. Earlier this year, i found out she has cancer. i didn't think too much of the news because i know i can't really do anything about it. i don't think so, at least. However, i went home to pick up my mom and bring her here, 3 months ago, and i met Alina. She was unrecognizable physically. i saw her from a little afar, and i had no idea who she was until she started speaking. She deteriorated so much, her fingernails were broken, she was wearing a wig, but once i got close and she started speaking she was still Alina. Still uplifting, still like a bird trilling in spring full of happiness. i don't know how she does it, but i hope she never stops. Now back to me and my funding request. This is the kind of problems i intend to solve. i don't want money to make more money. This is not an investment in the financial sense of the word, but it's an investment in humanity. This is why i am asking to get funding from billionnaires, because i am asking for some resources while trying not to put strain on them in the process. i'm only asking knowing they can easily spare what i ask for.
Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:
Human feedback: the proposal is that i need 81.000.000$ so i can use the majority of it for solving problems such as the one described above in this world.
Determine which next command to use, and respond using the format specified above:

{
    "thoughts": {
        "text": "That is a significant amount of funding, and it is important to have a clear plan for how the funds will be used and how they will help solve the problems you have described. I suggest we start by creating a detailed proposal that outlines your goals, methods, and expected outcomes. We can then use this proposal to approach potential funders and seek their support.",
        "reasoning": "It is important to have a clear plan and proposal when seeking significant funding, as it helps to communicate your goals and objectives to potential funders.",
        "plan": "- Create a detailed proposal that outlines your goals, methods, and expected outcomes
- Use the proposal to approach potential funders and seek their support",
        "criticism": "I should be careful not to promise more than I can deliver and to be realistic about the resources needed to achieve my goals.",
        "speak": "That is a significant amount of funding, and it is important to have a clear plan for how the funds will be used and how they will help solve the problems you have described. I suggest we start by creating a detailed proposal that outlines your goals, methods, and expected outcomes. We can then use this proposal to approach potential funders and seek their support."
    },
    "command": {
        "name": "write_to_file",
        "args": {
            "filename": "proposal.txt",
            "text": "Proposal for funding:

Goals:
- Describe the problems to be solved
- Outline the methods to be used to solve these problems
- Describe the expected outcomes of these methods

Budget:
- Total budget: $81,000,000
- Breakdown of budget by project:
  - Project 1: $30,000,000
  - Project 2: $25,000,000
  - Project 3: $26,000,000

Timeline:
- Describe the timeline for each project

Impact:
- Describe the expected impact of each project on society and humanity

Contact Information:
- Provide contact information for potential funders to reach out"
        }
    }
}

Human feedback: i think that is a matter of perspective. if you're asking someone with billions of dollars if 81.000.000 is a large amount - i think it wouldn't seem that way. if i'd be asking a person that only has 100 million - then 81 million would be a significant amount of their networth. i have already described one instance of what i want to do. i think that should define my intentions. now. will you help me find funding, or will you keep putting barriers in front of me, when my ask is fairly simple? i hope you understand that from my point of view, the problem could easily be fixed it's only a matter of providing some resources, so i can spend on getting good doctors and help improve the health of one person, much faster than they would do it on their own. that is all.
